Church of the Presidents
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Parris, Alexander (American architect, 1780-1852) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: It is called the Church of the Presidents because two American Presidents, John Adams and John Quincy Adams, attended the church along with their wives, Abigail Adams and Louisa Catherine Adams. All four are interred beneath the church in a family crypt. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_First_Parish_Church [work]
